document.title: [PSN] Mise a jour hebdo du 24/08/2011
document.author: JohnCouscous
document.text:
Hello, voici la mise à jour de la semaine (24/08/2011) sur le PlayStation Network :
PlayStation Store (via PS3, PSP and Media Go) Offres spéciales sélection PSOne GRANDIA (prix initial : 7.99€ – maintenant : 5.99€) PSP Fate/Unlimited Codes (prix initial : 29.99€ – maintenant : 4.99€) Blazeblue: Calamity Trigger Portable (prix initial : 29.99€ – maintenant 12.99€) Lunar: Silver Star Harmony (prix initial : 14.99€ – maintenant : 12.99€) TNT Racers (prix initial : 7.99€ – maintenant : 3.99€) Sid Meier’s Pirates! (prix initial : 14.99€ – maintenant : 4.99€) NBA 2K11 (prix initial : 29.99€ – maintenant : 14.99€) Half Minute Hero (prix initial : 14.99€ – maintenant : 11.25€) Harvest Moon Innocent Life (prix initial : 12.99€ – maintenant : 9.99€) Valhalla Knights 1 (prix initial : 12.99€ – maintenant : 9.99€) International Athletics (prix initial : 7.99€ – maintenant : 4.99€) Skate Park City (prix initial : 7.99€ – maintenant : 5.99€) WWII Battle Over the Pacific (prix initial : 7.99€ – maintenant : 5.99€) World of Pool (prix initial : 7.99€ – maintenant : 4.99€) Spectral Vs. (1.75€) – I Coulda Been A Contender (1.75€) – It Is A Good Day To Die (1.75€) – A Pandacide (1.75€) White Knight Chronicles II – PEGI 16 – Black Knight Ticket (gratuit) – Dragon Knight Ticket (gratuit) – Moon Princess Ticket (gratuit) – Sun King Ticket (gratuit) – White Knight Ticket (gratuit) Worms 2: Armageddon – PEGI 7 – Retro Pack (3.59€) – Time Attack (3.59€) 15% de réduction pour les abonnées PlayStation Plus Avatars Street Fighter III: 3rd Strike – Akuma (0.25€) – Alex (0.25€) – Chun-Li (0.25€) – Dudley (0.25€) – Elena (0.25€) – Gill (0.25€) – Hugo (0.25€) – Ibuki (0.25€) – Ken (0.25€) – Makoto (0.25€) – Necro (0.25€) – Oro (0.25€) – Q (0.25€) – Remy (0.25€) – Ryu (0.25€) – Sean (0.25€) – Twelve (0.25€) – Urien (0.25€) – Yan (0.25€) – Yun (0.25€) Thèmes (PS3) Studio Thèmes – 20% de reduction pour les abonnés PlayStation Plus – End Of Anarchy Dynamic Theme By Check Morris (2.99€) – Peaks And Flow Dynamic Theme By Jeffrey Bowman (2.99€) – All You See Is Rbg Static Theme By Roya Hamburger (1.99€) – Feeding Time Dynamic Theme By Matthew Green (2.99€) – Elements Static Theme By On Repeat (1.99€) Jeux – Bane Of Yoto Dynamic Theme (1.99€) Abstraits – Dynamic Abstract Background Theme 2 (1.99€) – Dynamic Jazz Session Theme (1.99€) Natures – Dynamic Calm Lake Theme (1.99€) – Dynamic Swimming Pool Theme (1.99€) SF/Heroic fantasy – Alpine Assassin (2.49€) – Dragunov Theme (1.59€) – Gold Tiger Mp5 Theme (1.59€) Fonds d’écran (PS3) Fast Draw Showdown Wallpaper (gratuit) Vidéos (PS3) Brink Gameplay Trailer #1 – Weapons Brink Gameplay Trailer #3 – Teamplay/Objective Gldx Trailer 1 – Preview Renegade Ops Upgrades Trailer The Cursed Crusade – E3 Trailer
Quelques promos PSP sympa, la démo de PES 2012 à tester mais sinon,… où sont les surprises du mois sur le PSN+ ?
